content: Continue along the path, where it curves down to the right. Here you'll find another Earth Rakshasa patrolling. Once you've dealt with the fire-breathing Rakshasa, keep going toward the pillar.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Continue along the path, where it curves down to the right. Here you'll find another Earth Rakshasa patrolling. Once you've dealt with the fire-breathing Rakshasa, keep going toward the pillar.
